description.value:
Your mech fires a massive projectile. A creature within 100 feet takes @Damage[(14 + (max(0,floor((@actor.level -16)/2))))d8[force]] damage, with a @Check[reflex|against:engineer|basic] save. Each other creature within 30 feet of the primary target takes half as much damage (basic Reflex save). Each of these enemies must also make a @Check[reflex|against:class-spell|traits:incapacitate] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. This save, but not the damage or its basic Reflex saves, has the incapacitate trait.

You can choose to spend two aetheric charges instead of just one to get the following benefits as well: Each creature that fails its basic Reflex save suffers @Damage[floor((14 + (max(0,floor((@actor.level -16)/2))))/4)d4[persistent,force]] damage.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Failure The target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Critical Failure The target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3}.

Level (+2) Increase the damage by 1d8, the range by 25 feet, and the radius of the secondary damage by 5 feet.
